body: @Rusty1004 That is him. For whatever reason the artist gets progressively lazier in drawing Gudao, in these doujins, in the first doujin he had his hair, he had his eyes and he actually talked in complete sentences, then in the second doujin he loses his eyes, talks less and in this one the artist didn't even try to give him any distinguishing features, and he never says anything outside of "I'm gonna cum."
Neko melt is the besting ever
Thank you whoever started translating these old Melt doujins lol
Melt gang wins over Carmilla gang.
Based melty scans for translating best girl doujins. Hope they do 297121 and 322952 soon
awyeah, I can finally read this one. ty melty scans for translating this series!
